update.description:
Delegate which repositories needs to be installed directly to gzdev. We are currently doing it now for -ci- jobs but not for -install- jobs.

This will remove current duplicity of setting up repositories needed in DSL for install jobs and foo-compilation.bash.

Tested here \(after running the DSL seed jobs\):

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_blueprint-install-pkg-bionic-amd64&build=132)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_blueprint-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/132/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_blueprint-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/132)

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-install-sdformat8_pkg-bionic-amd64&build=309)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/sdformat-install-sdformat8\_pkg-bionic-amd64/309/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/sdformat-install-sdformat8_pkg-bionic-amd64/309)

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_fuel-tools3-install-pkg-bionic-amd64&build=193)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_fuel-tools3-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/193/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_fuel-tools3-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/193/))

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install-gazebo10_pkg-xenial-amd64)
